headline: Verisk Winter Storm Fern Losses Underscore Growing Role In Risk Analytics
summary: Verisk Analytics (NasdaqGS:VRSK) estimates large insured industry losses from Winter Storm Fern. The event is on track to be the third costliest U.S. winter storm on record based on the company’s modeling. Updated regional loss estimates highlight Verisk’s role in insurance analytics and catastrophe modeling. For investors tracking insurance data providers, this update from Verisk highlights how critical detailed catastrophe modeling has become for carriers and reinsurers. As...

headline: New Insurance Industry Report: Reduced Catastrophe Losses Drive Continued Industry Improvements
summary: Verisk and APCIA report $35.3 billion underwriting gain through first nine months of 2025; combined ratio improves to 94 percentJERSEY CITY, N.J., Feb. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, and the American Property Casualty Insurance Association (APCIA), the primary national trade association for home, auto and business insurers, today announced improvements in U.S. industry performance thr
